reviews.review: matchmaking is perfect, haven't run into one cheater yet!

Interesting game play, competitive environment as well as casual options. definitely something you can sink many hours into. While the game overall is good, there is still the consistent cheater problem that continues to plague this title. Overall great game, undoubtedly a thumbs up.
